title: Nothing but the Girl: The Blatant Lesbian Image
description: A pictorial representation of the lesbian image by prominent lesbian photographers, this book contains over 20 portfolios with in-depth biographies of the artists. They discuss the themes which have fuelled their work, from sex, gender, race, fashion, the body and nature. the photographers featured include Della Grace, Jill Posener, Morgan Gwenwald and Honey Lee Cottrell.
author: Susie Bright
